title: Wasuhorn
text:
The Wasuhorn (3,343 m) is a <a href="mountain">mountain</a> of the Swiss <a href="Pennine%20Alps">Pennine Alps</a>, located west of <a href="St.%20Niklaus">St. Niklaus</a> in the canton of <a href="Valais">Valais</a>. It is the highest summit in the Jungtal.
On its northern side lies a glacier named "Junggletscher".
